name: Japan Electronics and Information TechnologyIndustries Association
goal: JEITA aims to promote an increase in the healthy production, trade and consumption of electronic equipment and electronic components, to help comprehensively develop electronics and IT industries and the economy and ensure our national culture can thrive.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Environment, Information Society, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Trade and E-Commerce, Privacy, Environment, Safety, CSR, Research and Technology
